== September 2007 US Teams Reports ==

== Projects ==
 {*} <nowiki>[[MassachusettsTeam/Projects/AluminiumCaseBadges|Case Badge Project]]</nowiki> Lead by the MassachusettsTeam

 {*} Several LoCo teams assisted in the planning of representing Ubuntu at the <nowiki>[[http://ohiolinux.org/|Ohio Linux Fest]]</nowiki>.

 {*} The project also encouraged LoCo teams to participate in SFD.

 {*} Engaged in discussion on how teams handle money and reduce exposure to liability 

== Meetings ==
 {*} A US Teams meeting was scheduled for September 22, but had to be postponed until Oct 4 due to poor attendance (Too many folks doing LoCo team stuff on the weekends! What a great problem to have!).
